iPearl Inc, USA is a company located in Apex, North Carolina, USA. Founded by a devoted Mac fan with over 10 iPods from 1st Generation iPod to iPhone and over 10 Macs(from iBook / iMac / MacBook / PowerMac / MacBook Pro / MacBook Air, etc) at hand for toys/development, we know Macs from inside out.
